today.title: Breakfast
today.description: A nourishing breakfast sets the tone for a productive day.

today.title: Lunch
today.description: A time to nourish not only the body but also the spirit.

today.title: Dinner
today.description: Feast your eyes on this delicious dinner spread.

ChineseCuisine.name: Spring Rolls
ChineseCuisine.description: Crispy rolls filled with a mix of vegetables and served with a sweet and sour dipping sauce.

ChineseCuisine.name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
ChineseCuisine.description: Chicken pieces cooked in a tangy and sweet sauce with bell peppers and pineapples.

ChineseCuisine.name: Kung Pao Shrimp
ChineseCuisine.description: Stir-fried shrimp with peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers in a spicy sauce.

ChineseCuisine.name: Fried Rice
ChineseCuisine.description: Stir-fried rice with vegetables, eggs, and your choice of chicken, beef, or shrimp.

ChineseCuisine.name: Chicken Manchurian
ChineseCuisine.description: Chicken pieces cooked in a tangy, spicy sauce with vegetables.

ChineseCuisine.name: Chinese Rice
ChineseCuisine.description: Stir-fried rice with vegetables and a hint of soy sauce.

DesiCuisine.name: Chicken Biryani
DesiCuisine.description: Fragrant rice dish with chicken, spices, and saffron.

DesiCuisine.name: Paneer Butter Masala
DesiCuisine.description: Cottage cheese cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce with butter and spices.

DesiCuisine.name: Rogan Josh
DesiCuisine.description: Tender lamb cooked in a rich, spicy gravy.

DesiCuisine.name: Naan
DesiCuisine.description: Soft and fluffy Indian bread, perfect for scooping up curries.

DesiCuisine.name: Palak Alu
DesiCuisine.description: Spinach and potatoes cooked with spices.

DesiCuisine.name: Chicken Karahi
DesiCuisine.description: Spicy chicken curry cooked in a wok-like pan with tomatoes and green chilies.

DesiCuisine.name: Beef Kofta
DesiCuisine.description: Spiced beef meatballs in a rich tomato sauce.

DesiCuisine.name: Alu Paratha
DesiCuisine.description: Flatbread stuffed with spiced mashed potatoes.

Desserts.name: Gulab Jamun
Desserts.description: Deep-fried dough balls soaked in a sweet syrup flavored with rose water and cardamom.

Desserts.name: Mango Sticky Rice
Desserts.description: Sweet sticky rice served with ripe mango and a drizzle of coconut milk.

Desserts.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
Desserts.description: Rich chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

Desserts.name: Tiramisu
Desserts.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

Desserts.name: Kheer
Desserts.description: Creamy rice pudding flavored with cardamom and topped with nuts.

Juices.name: Mango Juice
Juices.description: Refreshing juice made from ripe mangoes.

Juices.name: Pineapple Juice
Juices.description: Sweet and tangy juice made from fresh pineapples.

Juices.name: Mixed Berry Juice
Juices.description: A blend of strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries in a refreshing juice.
